topic.title: Who here is running the latest git version?

1_16Hg8ux8t4gqZjGgiEUWQ8xAsqJrtJv7MC.body: I think this novel wicked fast javascript is making people post a lot more than necessary :P
I think contributing to it will make a nice side project. How many of you have forked the git repo? (i)

14_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body: a few different places at once until I gave in and looked in depth: torrentfreaks' article (https://torrentfreak.com/play-p2p-impossible-shutdown-160301/), r/futurology r/agorism r/cryptoanarchy (at least 2 of those)
